Subscription.SubscriptionId: Windows PowerShell - Script Block Tracing warnings (v5+)
Subscription.Description: Provides visibility of PowerShell execution when sensitive PowerShell functions are used (version 5.0+)
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <Query Id="0" Path="Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational"> <!-- Selects PowerShell 'Script Block Tracing' (4104) warnings, PowerShell 5+ --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational">*[System[EventID=4104 and Level!=5]]</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
